title: A beginner’s guide to starting a career in design
content:
Let’s face it, design plays a huge part in all our lives. It affects everything from the bed we sleep in to the car we drive, and the magazines we read to the websites that we visit. Simply put, design shapes the world we live in. It’s importance really can’t be underestimated. But how much do you really know about this exciting sector? It would be silly to lump all designers together. If you asked a product designer to create a user pathway they wouldn’t know where to begin. Likewise, if you tasked an experiential designer with creating a website,…

description: Thinking of a career in design? This quick and dirty guide will give you the low down on the key differences between different design careers.
